name: Koa: A Gluttonous Wizard
description:
Help Koa overcome one of his sins on his adventure to defeat Gluttony, in this tiny and unique platformer full of magic, focus and a lot of bitter sweet challenges.

  • Challenge your senses and your brain
  • Take your reflexes and attention to the extreme
  • 20 levels with unique challenges
  • Follow, jump and don't stop!

Follow the symbol sequences as they appear on the screen, try not to miss any, don't get hit by any hazards and don't take too much time to do it.

The game is early in development, please reach out if you have any comments.
